description:
Experience the cozy comfort of your favorite quilt on a snowy day, right in the Aspire Quilted Half-Zip. This luxuriously soft pullover offers breathability and warmth, with ribbed cuffs and hem for that perfect snug fit.

  • Easy-to-use ring pull zipper
  • Rib detailing at the hem and cuffs for a snug and comfortable fit
  • Embraces one of the season's hottest trends with its quilted pattern
  • Offers a relaxed and comfortable fit
name: MPG Aspire Quilted Half-Zip - Women's
